name: 30A Beach Latitude & Longitude Coordinate Necklace
description:
The Latitude and Longitude coordinates of beautiful 30A is handstamped on solid sterling silver charms. Accented with green chalcedony stone.

Keep one of the worlds most beautiful beaches close to your heart!

30° 11' N/ 85° 47' W

Suspended from 18" sterling silver chain. 
Other length options available, contact us to order.

 Find us on FACEBOOK for exclusive sales, new designs and all things beach! 
www.Facebook.com/BellaBeachJewels

name: Beach Babe Hawaiian Cone Shell Necklace
description:
A surf tumbled Hebrew Cone shell floats freely around a handforged sterling silver hoop, artfully hammered to sparkle in the sun! 
Looks great with a bikini or a little black dress for a night on the town!

Long sterling silver chain

Other shell types available, convo us to purchase

name: Abalone Shell & Chrysophase Necklace
description:
Gorgeous natural handcut Abalone shell is suspended from sterling silver and accented with green Chysophase stones! Beautiful and eyecatching!

name: Lucky Shark Tooth Necklace
description:
A Natural Mako shark tooth amulet is suspended from 18" solid sterling silver chain. 

The clasp is accented with green Chysophase stones.

Chain length adjustments available upon request.
Please leave chain length in note to seller at checkout.

Due to their natural nature each shark tooth varies slightly in sizes and colors variations.

Every girl has to have one for good luck!

Find us on Facebook for exclusive sale codes, new designs, and all things BEACH!

name: Gift Certificate- $50
description:
$50 GIFT CERTIFICATE for all items at Bella Beach Jewels. Our unique mermaid certificate can be sent for FREE directly to the recipient via postal mail or via email as a PDF file. Or it can be sent to you to be given in person. Please let me know your preference in the message to seller portion of the checkout when you order. If the certificate is being sent to the recipient, please don't forget to include the following: Recipients Name&Address: Senders Name: The gift certificate will include a unique certificate number. Each certificate is valid for 1 year from the date of issue (purchase date). Any unused portion will be reissued as a new gift certificate. Cannot be returned or redeemed for cash. Other increments are available by request. THIS GIFT CERTIFICATE IS VALID ONLY AT www.BellaBeachJewelry.etsy.com www.BellaBeachJewels.com
